snippet: Islamist militants killed 10 paramilitary soldiers they had been holding hostage since last month, government officials said Monday.
abstract: Islamist militants in Pakistan kill 10 paramilitary soldiers they had been holding hostage; action is second time in a week the insurgents have killed security force captives near Afghan border.
lead_paragraph: Islamist militants killed 10 paramilitary soldiers they had been holding hostage since last month, government officials said Monday.
